title: why hasn't sona been cured of her aphonia?
body:
This is fantasy world where mortal wounds can be healed by magic or healing salves/potions; yet sona still can't talk because ???

surely someone has created some kind of spell or some substance that could allow sona to form words using her vocal chords. Hell, sona can heal others with her music, why can't she learn how to use that same magic to heal herself???
